Increase £1,752

Retention adjustment

The retention factor is always 1 because it is not applicable to pre-16 students. The adjustment is always £0.

Total retention adjustment

£0

Student funding after retention adjustment £276,000
Programme cost weighting for subjects that cost more to deliver
Calculation: Multiply 		Multiply 1.04
Core programme up to programme cost weighting
Calculation: Equals 		Equals £287,040
Where programme cost weighting comes from

For directly funded 14 to 16 year old students, we apply a weighting of 1.04 to the student funding rate.
